author: Staff Reporter
text:
The DMK’s poll manifesto will be the hero in this election as it has been in the past, said K. Kanimozhi, Rajya Sabha MP.

She told reporters here on Saturday that the DMK was geared-up for election and partymen were ready to launch the campaign. As regards coalition and seat sharing, party leaders would decide, she said.

Ms. Kanimozhi wanted the Election Commission to include Customs and Income Tax officials in the teams that search and seize unaccounted cash in the run-up the elections.
title: ‘Manifesto will be hero’
